identity.name: LUMIÈRE
identity.description: A digital boutique for high-end furniture. Dark, moody atmospheres pierced by gold accents. The interface feels like a VIP showroom—quiet, spacious, and confident.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and product names. Use 'tracking-tight' for large sizes.

body.usage: Descriptions, prices, UI elements, navigation. Clean and legible at small sizes.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on the background to prevent banding and add 'film grain' feel.

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-12 to p-24 for section padding. Gap-8 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-accent uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold px-8 py-4 rounded-none transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-primary/30 text-primary hover:border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold px-8 py-4 rounded-none

cards.product: group relative bg-card border border-border/50 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-500 overflow-hidden

hero.alt: Dark luxury living room with velvet sofa

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lenis' for smooth scrolling and 'framer-motion' for animations.
2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' and 'index.css' immediately with the provided color palette. Force DARK MODE by default.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to 'index.css' or 'index.html'.
4. LAYOUT: Do not use standard Bootstrap-style grids. Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the product showcase (mix of col-span-1, col-span-2, row-span-2).
5. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded corners (set radius to 0 or 2px) and use the Gold/Black palette.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. NAVIGATION: Create a sticky, glassmorphism header (bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-md) with a gold bottom border (1px, opacity 0.2).
8. CHECKOUT: Ensure the checkout form is elegant—minimal inputs, clear typography, gold submit button.
9. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (e.g., 'add-to-cart-btn', 'checkout-submit').
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Contrast: Ensure text is readable on dark backgrounds (use #FAFAFA or #EDEDED, never pure white #FFFFFF).
Spacing: When in doubt, double the padding.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale slightly (0.98) on click. Links should have a gold underline animation on hover.
